japanese: ５年後――
translation: Five years later%p-2;――

japanese: いらっしゃ――
translation: Welcome%p-2;――

japanese: って、あんたたちか。
translation: Oh, it's you guys.

japanese: 一花、久しぶり。
translation: It's been a while, Ichika.

japanese:
久しぶり、２人とも。
元気そうでよかった。
translation:
It's good to see you guys. 
And you're in a good shape as well.

japanese: それにお店も大繁盛のようで。
translation: And I see the shop is obviously bursting at the seams with customers.

japanese: あらあら、さすが大女優様はジョークがお上手ねぇ。
translation:
Oh my, as expected of a top actress,
you're skilled at telling jokes.

japanese:
うーん、いいねぇ。
こういうやり取り、久しぶりで逆に嬉しくなっちゃう。
translation:
Ohh, how nice.
I'm actually happy to have this kind of exchange
after such a long time.

japanese:
一花、ずっと東京だから。
全員集合するのもいつぶりかな。
translation:
You've been in Tokyo all this time, Ichika.
When was the last time we were all together?

japanese:
まだ全員じゃないよね？
四葉は？
translation:
Not everyone is here yet, right?
What about Yotsuba?

japanese:
遅れるって連絡はないし、すぐに来るよ。
それまでなにか食べる？
translation:
She didn't say she'd be late,
so she should be here soon.
Would you like something to eat until then?

japanese: うん、いただこうかな。
translation: Yeah, I'll have something.

japanese:
私も軽くお腹に入れとこう。
ではシェフのお勧め、お願いしまーす。
translation:
I'll have something light too.
Then, I'll go with the chef's recommendation, pleaaase.

japanese:
ふんっ、東京のお洒落なカフェばかり
巡ってる人の口に合うかしら。
translation:
Hmph, I wonder if it will suit the taste of someone
who only goes around trendy cafes in Tokyo.

japanese: あれ？　私がカフェ巡りしてるの教えたっけ？
translation: Huh? Did I tell you I go cafe hopping?

japanese: 二乃、いつも一花のＳＮＳ見張ってるから。
translation: Nino is always keeping an eye your social media, Ichika.

japanese: 三玖！　言うんじゃないわよ！
translation: Miku! Don't say that!

japanese: でも私もつい見ちゃうんだよね、心配で。
translation: But I also tend to check it, out of concern.

japanese: 心配？　どうして？
translation: Concern? Why?

japanese:
ほら、万が一、アップしてる写真に
上杉君が映り込んでいたら大問題になるでしょ？
translation:
Well, you know, if by any chance,
Uesugi-kun appears in a picture that's been uploaded,
it could become a big problem, don't you think?

japanese: あー、そこか。
translation: Ahh, I see.

japanese:
大丈夫、細心の注意を払ってるから。
五月ちゃんの心配性も相変わらずだね。
translation:
It's okay, I'm being extremely careful.
And as always Itsuki-chan worries about everything.

japanese:
生徒を心配する感じで
一花の心配もしてるんじゃない？
さすが先生だわ。
translation:
You worry about Ichika
the same way you'd be worrying about your students,
right? As expected of a teacher.

japanese: そういうわけじゃないよ。
translation: That's not the case.

japanese:
でも一花、ホントに気をつけなさいよね。
あんたがスキャンダル起こしたら、
この店にまでマスコミが来そうだし。
translation:
But really, Ichika, please be careful.
If you cause a scandal,
the media might come to this shop too.

japanese:
そんなことになったら、
やっと増えてきた常連さんに迷惑かけちゃうわ。
translation:
If that happens, it'd be a nuisance
to the regulars who just started to settle in.

japanese:
こんな設備の整った場所を貸してくれた
お父さんにも悪い。
translation:
I feel bad for your father-in-law as he is lending us
this well-equipped place.

japanese:
わかってる。
２人の努力を無駄になんてしない。
translation:
I know that.
I won't let your efforts go to waste.

japanese: でも二乃が心配してるのは、お店より一花だよね。
translation:
But Nino, you're more worried about Ichika
than your shop, right?

japanese:
みぃーくぅー！
さっきから一言余計よ！
translation:
MIIIKUUU!
That's enough already!

japanese: お邪魔しまーす！
translation: Heeey everyone!

japanese:
あっ、一花！
もう来てたんだ、久しぶり！
translation:
Ah, Ichika!
You're already here! It's been a while!

japanese: 四葉、久しぶり。
translation: Sure has, Yotsuba.

japanese:
よかったー！
めちゃくちゃ忙しそうだから、
遅刻するんじゃないかなって心配してたんだ。
translation:
Thank goodness!
You looked super busy,
so I was worried you might be late.

japanese: いやぁ、さすがに自分の結婚式に遅刻はないでしょ。
translation: Nah, I wouldn't be late for my own wedding.

japanese: でも一花、本当に忙しそうだね。
translation: But really, Ichika, you seem really busy.

japanese: うん、おかげさまで。
translation: Yeah, thanks to everyone.

japanese:
テレビをつけたら映ってるし。
見ない日はないくらい。
translation:
I see your face whenever I turn the TV on.
There are hardly any days when I don't see you.

japanese:
それはさすがに、みんなが私の出てる番組を
チェックしてくれてるからじゃないかな。
translation:
That's probably because you're checking out
the shows I'm on.

japanese:
でも、いつかは本当に毎日映っちゃうくらい、
お仕事頑張っていきたい。
translation:
But I have to work very hard to appear on the TV almost 
every day.

japanese:
とか言ってるけど、フー君とはどうなのよ。
ちゃんと２人の時間作れてるの？
translation:
You say that, but what about Fu-kun?
Are you able to see each other?

japanese: それはもちろん。
translation: Of course we are.

japanese:
まあ、最近はロケで遠くに行くことも多いし
会えない時間も増えちゃってるけどね。
translation:
Well, lately the locations I need to go to are very far away
and it's very hard to spend some time together.

japanese:
今日もギリギリまで地方ロケだったから、
現場から直接ここに来たんだ。
translation:
I was working on another location in this region and I barely
made it back on time.

japanese:
ええー！？
そうなんだ、大変だね。
translation:
Oh really?!
That must have been tough.

japanese: そういう日が続くと寂しくない？
translation: Do you feel lonely if you have to work all day?

japanese:
毎日ちゃんと電話してるから。
風太郎の声を聞けば寂しさなんて吹き飛んじゃう。
translation:
I talk to him on the phone every day and as long as I hear his
voice I don't feel lonely at all.

japanese:
それにお仕事も楽しいんだよね。
だからいま、すごく充実してる。
translation:
Plus, I really enjoy my work,
so I'm very fulfilled right now.

japanese: でも、キスの演技はＮＧなんだ？
translation: But kissing scenes are a no-go, right?

japanese:
まあね～。
昔から事務所に言ってあるし。
translation:
Well, yeah.
That's what I told the agency a while ago.

japanese: 今日以降は解禁？
translation: Will they be allowed after today?

japanese: んー……。
translation: Hm...

japanese: 風太郎が嫉妬しちゃうから、やっぱりダメかな。
translation:
Futaro would get jealous,
so it's probably not a good idea.

japanese: いいご身分ねぇ、大女優様？
translation: Well, isn't that nice for you big actress.

japanese: あはは……。
translation: Ahaha...

japanese:
あ、そうそう。
今日、私の担当メイクさん来てくれるって。
translation: Oh, by the way, my makeup artist is coming today.

japanese: ということは、あれ、本当にやるの？
translation: Does that mean you're really doing it?

japanese: うん、やるよ。
translation: Yep. I am.

japanese: 上杉君には確かめておかないと。
translation: Uesugi-kun needs to confirm it.

japanese:
じゃあ、そろそろ行く？
色々準備もあるし。
translation:
Okay, shall we go?
There's a lot of preparation to do.

japanese: 待って。
translation: Wait a minute.

japanese: うん？
translation: Hm?

japanese: これ、あんたに渡しておくわ。
translation: We want to give these to you.

japanese: お母さんの形見のピアス……。
translation: Mom's heirloom earrings...

japanese: そうよ、私が預かってたほう。
translation: Yes. I've kept them for this occasion.

japanese: これが私たちからの結婚祝い。
translation: This is our wedding present to you.

japanese:
じゃあ、いくよ。
せーの――
translation:
Alright, here we go.
One, two, three%p-2;――

japanese: 一花、結婚おめでとう！
translation: Ichika, congratulations on getting married!

japanese: ありがとう、みんな。
translation: Thank you, everyone.

japanese:
あ、やば……。
なんだか泣いちゃいそう。
translation:
Oh, no...
I think I'm gonna cry.

japanese: まだ早い。
translation: It's still too early for that.

japanese:
あはは、だね。
本番にとっておかないと。
translation:
Ahaha, you're right.
We have to save it for the real thing.

japanese:
本当は、私たちがピアスホールも
開けてあげるつもりだったんだけど――
translation:
To be honest, we were also planning to
get your ears pierced for you as a gift%p-2;――

japanese:
ごめんね。
もう両方とも開いちゃってるんだ。
translation:
Sorry about that.
Turns out I already have both of them pierced.

japanese: 残念だわー、楽しみにしてたのに。
translation:
Aww, that's too bad.
We were looking forward to it.

japanese: 笑顔が怖いんだけど……。
translation: Those are some scary smiles...

japanese: じゃあ、そろそろ――
translation: Anyway, it's about time%p-2;――

japanese: うん、行こうかみんな。
translation: Shall we get going, everyone?
